alert.note: Alert for Northwestern Nye County; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 3:11PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...An area of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Lander and northwestern Nye Counties through 415 PM PDT... At 310 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking an area of strong thunderstorms 14 miles southeast of Gabbs, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. blowing dust restricting visibility to 2 miles or less. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Kingston, Austin, Gabbs, Gillman Springs, Berlin Ichthyosaur SP, Carvers, Caroll Summit, Railroad Pass, Reese River Valley, Hadley, Arc Dome, Bob Scott Summit and Ione. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northwestern Nye County; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County
